name: Check the transition to the page my wish after clicking on the button. User is not authorized
description:
This test will check that after clicking on the add to wishlist button,
            you are redirected to the My Wishlist page
            User is not authorized
descriptionHtml:
This test will check that after clicking on the add to wishlist button,
        you are redirected to the My Wishlist page
        User is not authorized
statusMessage:
XFAIL In CI, there is no transition to the user registration page, so the test fails

  (unknown error: DevToolsActivePort file doesn't exist)
  (The process started from chrome location /usr/bin/google-chrome is no longer running, so ChromeDriver is assuming that Chrome has crashed.)
